data_description.api_name: The API name for your heater vendor. This is visible in the 'API Host' entry in the 'Version' menu item in the mobile app/web app. If the host name is of the form api-foo.xxxx or api.xxxx use the values api-foo or api respectively.
data_description.basic_auth_creds: This is an HTTP Basic Auth credential used to do initial authentication with the server. Use the base64 encoded string directly
data_description.session_retry_attempts: How many times to retry session REST operations
data_description.session_backoff_factor: How much to backoff between REST retries
data_description.socket_reconnect_attempts: How many times to try reconnecting the socket.io socket
data_description.socket_backoff_factor: How much to backoff between initial socket connect attempts

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthentication
reauth_confirm.description: The Smartbox integration needs to re-authenticate your account
